attributes.action: Shut down Sky’s services in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: As all of you may already know, and experience daily, Sky is atrocious.
attributes.background: I, and many other citizens of the UK, have had to suffer with the poor quality of Sky, and their internet services. As a result of the constant poor quality, and lack of improvement in recent times, even after many complaints, I believe the company and their services should be shut down in the UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because complaints against media companies are the responsibilities of Ofcom which is independent of the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out how to contact Ofcom here:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/home
